Author: pothosgonerogue
Text: Iâ€™m being treated for BPD and all my meds are low dose as well. Otherwise I go off one of many deep ends so I get those weird days too (as proven in my taco protest).

Author: digiskunk
Text: I can relate to an extent...  I grew up with bipolar disorder and although I'm currently being treated for it, all of my meds are low-dosage, so I still experience the highs and lows to an extent. And because of this, I'm constantly stuck in periods where I'm "recovering" and then restricting. It's tough.   I'm not in a relationship so I can't relate there, but I understand where you're coming from to an extent. And it sucks.
